name: Save and sell them
description:
"They are in trouble! And you need money to repair your super ship! Save them from disaster, they are worth a few things!"

This game prototype was made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 44, theme was "your life is currency".

I recommend you to use windows version for best performance.

Software used :

GameMakerStudio 1.99.

Fire Alpaca, Audacity, Chiptones, MusicMakerJam, Paint.net.

Font used :

8BIT WONDER, Cartoonist.

Control :

KEYBOARD :

WASD to move, Space to jump or cancel, Enter to valid in menu.

GAMEPAD : 

Button 0 to jump or cancel, Button 1 to valid in menu (depend of your gamepad).
